message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives us both a good share.
Your offer was a good starting point. I propose a slightly more balanced split considering the inflation.
I understand your point about inflation, but the split needs to be more beneficial for me considering the faster devaluation of the money for me.
Time is running out, and we both lose with every round. This offer provides a good balance between your need for a larger share due to faster devaluation and fairness.
